name: Potassium peroxide
desc: Potassium peroxide is an inorganic compound with the molecular formula K2O2. It is formed as potassium reacts with oxygen in the air, along with potassium oxide (K2O) and potassium superoxide (KO2).
Other anions:
Potassium oxide
Potassium superoxide
Potassium chloride
